name: astralform-plugins
description: Astralform plugins for Claude Code - manage AI agent projects and development tooling

plugins.name: astralform
plugins.description: Manage Astralform AI agent projects directly from Claude Code - create projects, manage API keys, configure LLMs, and integrate the iOS SDK

plugins.name: lint
plugins.description: Data-driven lint plugin with 9 language support, auto-fix integration, and blocking behavior for missing tools
